lyric:

[00:08.02]First things first
[00:09.17]I'ma say all the words inside my head
[00:12.10]I'm fired up and tired of the way that things have been oh ooh
[00:18.25]The way that things have been oh ooh
[00:23.12]Second thing second
[00:24.55]Don't you tell me what you think that I could be
[00:27.46]I'm the one at the sail I'm the master of my sea oh ooh
[00:33.54]The master of my sea oh ooh
[00:38.33]I was broken from a young age
[00:40.10]Taking my sulking to the masses
[00:41.96]Writing my poems for the few
[00:43.56]That look at me took to me shook to me feeling me
[00:45.79]Singing from heartache from the pain
[00:47.69]Taking my message from the veins

[00:54.94]Pain

[01:17.77]Pain

[01:49.43]Inhibited limited

[01:52.81]It rained down like
[01:56.35]Pain
